segments.text: This is room 1425.We asked for the room service an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're very sorry to cause you a lot of inconvenience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're rather busy right now.It will take another 15 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it really going to take that long ? Will you rush the order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid it would take 15 minutes at most .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , well , we have no choice .
segments.speaker: S1
